channel.title: Vince Kaichan
channel.description: site updates and blog posts for vince kaichan

item.title: new album: Tracker Works 2014-2018
item.description: new album! Tracker Works 2014-2018, songs written in OpenMPT that were only uploaded to Soundcloud and this website for the longest time. also available on the usual streaming services

item.title: new album: Gem Blenders Soundtrack 2
item.description: new album! Gem Blenders Soundtrack 2, a few tracks that I was commissioned to write for the second Gem Blenders Kickstarter campaign. also available on SoundCloud and all the usual streaming services

item.title: new album: lost in focus
item.description: new album! lost in focus, you can also find it under the 'albums/EPs' section below. this time i'll be donating the revenue to Open The Circle, a nonprofit that channels resources into footwork education and community organizing in Chicago.

item.title: now on spotify
item.description: (more of) my music is now on spotify! and apple music and all the other streaming platforms. still in the process of uploading older albums but all my most recent releases are now available for streaming.

item.title: new single: RSNNT CHMBR
item.description: new single! RSNNT CHMBR, a remix of a song from Animusic 2. you can also find it under the 'albums/EPs' section below.

item.title: lost in time reviewed by passion in the weiss
item.description: my album got reviewed by passion in the weiss! Ghost in the 404: March 2021â€™s Best Electronic and Dance Music

item.title: lost in time reviewed in the chicago reader
item.description: my album got reviewed in the chicago reader! Chicago producer Vince Kaichan steers footwork toward serenity on Lost in Time

item.title: song sorting
item.description: added the ability to sort tables by date or name, ascending and descending. click on the column header to sort by that column in ascending order, click it again to sort by descending order

item.title: new album: lost in time
item.description: new album! lost in time, you can also find it under the 'albums/EPs' section below. if you buy it on bandcamp, your purchase will be donated to My Block, My Hood, My City, a nonprofit organization that helps underprivileged youth in chicago.

item.title: rss feed now available
item.description: some friends said i should add an rss feed for these news posts so here it is. please let me know if anything isn't working correctly

item.title: first post
item.description: added this little news feed to the site. most of the entries will just be website updates/music release announcements but i plan on eventually using it for blog posts (once i figure out what i want to blog about...)
